lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho has been charged with misconduct in the wake of his comments about referee Anthony Taylor before Manchester United's goalless draw with Liverpool last week, the Football Association said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Mourinho, Moyes Charged With Misconduct by FA
headline.main: Mourinho, Moyes Charged With Misconduct by FA

snippet: Jose Mourinho has been charged with misconduct in the wake of his comments about referee Anthony Taylor before Manchester United's goalless draw with Liverpool last week, the Football Association said on Thursday....
